title: Creating a Bar Graph
body: By the end of $$2011$$, Facebook had over $$146$$ million users in the United States. The table shows three age groups, the number of users in each age group, and the proportion (%) of users in each age group.\n##figure2.gif
lesson: 2.1 Stem-and-Leaf Graphs (Stemplots), Line Graphs, and Bar Graphs
